awardsHtml:
4 wins & 11 nominations

(For episode "Challenges Of Life".)

Martin Elsbury (editor) - Sharon Gillooly (editor) (For episode "Challenges Of Life".)
2010 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Nonfiction Series
Catherine McCarthy (executive producer for bbc) - Michael Gunton (executive producer) - Susan Winslow (executive producer for discovery channel) - Paul Spillenger (producer for discovery channel) - Martha Holmes (series producer)
2010 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Editing for Nonfiction Programming (Single or Multi-Camera)

2010 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Sound Mixing for Nonfiction Programming
